Download Codebook Files

download_codebook.Rd

Downloads codebook/support files (PDFs, questionnaires, metadata files) into a local directory.

Usage

download_codebook(srvy, dest_dir = tempdir(), file = NULL, quiet = FALSE, refresh = FALSE, overwrite = FALSE)

Arguments

srvy

A qesR survey code.

dest_dir

Directory where files should be downloaded.

file

Optional file selector passed to get_codebook().

quiet

If TRUE, suppress informational output.

refresh

If TRUE, force a fresh codebook metadata download first.

overwrite

If TRUE, overwrite existing files in dest_dir.

Value

A data frame containing source file metadata and local download paths.

On this page

Developed by qesR contributors.

Site built with pkgdown 2.2.0.
